title1: RENSA Nano Sanitizing Sprayer with UVC-LED Blue Light Technology
title2: WANT PROFESSIONAL-GRADE SANITIZATION without THE PROFESSIONAL PRICE TAG?
bulletPoints: Portable power sprayer designed for high-touch areas makes disinfecting surfaces quick and efficient.
Fine mist reduces product waste. Use only what you need to disinfect. No wiping needed.
Hands-free sanitization. Electronic handheld sprayer means you don't have to touch the chemicals or the space you're cleaning.
Double the sanitizing power. We've added blue-light technology to take your cleaning power to the next level.
Light-weight and portable. No chords needed. The Rensa Mystifier travels well and fits in small spaces. AND it's battery lasts through multiple cleans.
